Scripts.OnClick: if QDKP2GUI_Log.MainSelection=="RAID" then QDKP2GUI_Log:Toggle() else QDKP2GUI_Log:ShowRaid(); end

Scripts.OnEnter:
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Starts a new session, enabling all
raid management section.
To start a new session you have
to be in a party or in a raid.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Close an active session, finalizing the log\nand stopping the raid management.");

Scripts.OnClick: QDKP2_OpenInputBox("Enter the new DKP amount.",function(arg) QDKP2GUI_Main:dkpAwardRaidSet(arg); end)
Scripts.OnEnter:
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Amount of DKP you want to award the raid
when clicking on the 'Award' button.
Click it, the arrows or scroll with your mouse
wheel to adjust the amount.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Gives to all eligible guild members in raid\nthe amount of DKP specified.");

Scripts.OnMouseWheel: if arg1==1 then QDKP2GUI_Main:dkpPerHourSet("+") else QDKP2GUI_Main:dkpPerHourSet("-") end
Scripts.OnClick: QDKP2_OpenInputBox("Enter the new DKP amount.",function(arg) QDKP2GUI_Main:dkpPerHourSet(arg); end)
Scripts.OnEnter:
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Amount of DKP awarded hourly
to each raiding player.
Click it, the arrows or scroll with your mouse
wheel to adjust the amount.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Starts/Stop the raid timer that will\ngive the specified amount of DKP\nevery hour. Control+click to pause it.");

Scripts.OnMouseWheel: if arg1==1 then QDKP2GUI_Main:dkpIMSet("+") else QDKP2GUI_Main:dkpIMSet("-") end
Scripts.OnClick: QDKP2_OpenInputBox("Enter the new DKP amount.",function(arg) QDKP2GUI_Main:dkpIMSet(arg); end)
Scripts.OnEnter:
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Amount of DKP awarded when
for the IronMan bonus.
Click it, the arrows or scroll with your mouse
wheel to adjust the amount.");

Scripts.OnClick: if not IsControlKeyDown() then QDKP2GUI_Main:Ironman() else QDKP2_IronManWipe() end
Scripts.OnEnter:
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Starts/Finalizes the ironman bonus, used
to award the raid members which attended
the whole raid.
Control+click to wipe the data.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText('If this is checked, when a boss dies, the raid gets\nthe amount of DKP specified in the options file.');

GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("If this is checked, when someone says
in raid or raid warning a phrase like
'xyz won with 54' or similar, a dialog
will ask if you want to charge him
for that amount to pay the last object
seen in chat.");

GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("If this is checked, when a player loots an
item wich falls in one of the cases specified
in the options file, the charge window will
popup.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Upload all the changes done to the Officer/Public notes");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Backup all the officernotes on this computer.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Restore the data from a previous backup");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Export all guildmembers' DKP amounts\nas plain text, html or xml.");

Scripts.OnClick: if arg1=="LeftButton" then QDKP2GUI_Roster:LeftClickEntry() else QDKP2GUI_Roster:RightClickEntry() end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Drag and drop here or shift+click the item\n you wish to bid for. You can also enter\na custom text instead of the item.");
Scripts.OnMouseDown: if not QDKP2_BidM_isBidding() then QDKP2GUI_Roster:DragDropManager() end
Scripts.OnReceiveDrag: if not QDKP2_BidM_isBidding() then QDKP2GUI_Roster:DragDropManager() end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Push this button to close the bid and\nset the selected player as winner.");

Scripts.OnClick: if QDKP2GUI_Log.MainSelection=="RAID" then QDKP2GUI_Log:Toggle() else QDKP2GUI_Log:ShowRaid(); end

Scripts.OnMouseDown: if arg1=="RightButton" then QDKP2GUI_Roster:RosterMenu() elseif arg1=="LeftButton" then QDKP2GUI_CloseMenus() end

Scripts.OnClick: if arg1=="LeftButton" then QDKP2GUI_Log:LeftClick() else QDKP2GUI_Log:RightClick() end

Scripts.OnMouseDown: if arg1=="RightButton" then QDKP2GUI_Log:WindowMenu() elseif arg1=="LeftButton" then QDKP2GUI_CloseMenus() end
